doctor.name: Dr. S.M. Golam Sarwar
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Diseases of the Chest & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. S.M. Golam Sarwar is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, DTCD, FCCP (USA). He is a Consultant, Respiratory Medicine at National Institute of Diseases of the Chest & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. S.M. Golam Sarwar at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 2pm to 5pm (Sat to Thu), 10am to 2pm (Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. S. M. Masuduzzaman
doctor.specialty: Asthma, TB, COPD, Bronchitis, & Chest Diseases Specialist
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Diseases of the Chest & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. S. M. Masuduzzaman is a Chest Diseases Specialist in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Chest Diseases). He is a Registrar, Respiratory Medicine at National Institute of Diseases of the Chest & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Modern Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. S. M. Masuduzzaman at Modern Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 6pm to 8pm (Sat, Mon & Wed).
